name: Van Gogh's Syndrome
description:
Van Gogh's Syndrome

We all know the crazy Story of the painter Van Gogh who cut his ear and sent it to his lover.

But after cutting it , Van Gogh forgot where he put it, so he went into a journey looking for it.

This game was made in 72h for Global Game Jam 2021 for the theme "Lost&Found".

Made By: Arts: 
  • Brahim Ben Youssef
Code & Game Design:
  • Nouha Chebbi
  • Brahim Ben Youssef
  • Mahdi Ben Salem
  • Hamza Hassen
How to play:
  • Mouvement:  WASD or Arrow Keys.
  • Camera mouv: Mouse.
  • Attack: E Key.
  • Inventory select: Alpha 1 --> 5.

Enjoy and tell us what do you think!
